data.title: Storage Units in Bloomfield, NJ on Grove St
data.meta_description: Looking for storage units in Bloomfield, NJ? Discover iStorage Self Storage on Grove St, offering secure and convenient solutions. Reserve today!
data.text:
iStorage in Bloomfield New Jersey, on Grove Street!

East of the Garden State Parkway, you’ll find our Grove Street Self Storage facility nestled in an easy-to-reach part of Bloomfield at 211 Grove Street. From the Parkway, exit east onto Dodd Street and keep right, following the street as it turns into Watsessing Avenue. From there, continue east until you reach Grove Street, then head south until you spot us across from Wendy’s, just above Staples. We are as easy to find as we are to store with.

The Best Solutions, for your Storage Project

We can offer a wide variety of storage units to accommodate any of your needs. Whether you are looking to downsize, or simply going through a move, consider iStorage as a storage solution that will fit your budget. We have plenty to offer our Bloomfield residents, from moving supplies, to small lockers for simple storage, our site has everything and more. Our staff are all storage experts, we will work with you one-on-one to find a solution that suits your budget and needs.

Long-Term & Short-Term Rentals

Not only do we carry physical features to make your life easy, but we also have technology as an extra layer to help with your storage journey. With easy online payments, autopay and no deposit down, we make your billing cycle less of a headache. We also offer month-to-month leases. Whether you need storage for multiple years or just a few months, let us help you find the right option for your future without breaking the bank. Call us today for more information on our simple month-to-month leases.

Ease of Access

Our Bloomfield facility has easy-to-use loading docks to make your life simpler and save you any backaches. We also allow afterhours access so even if we aren’t in the office you can still get to your belongings hassle-free. Our electronic gate access and keypad with individual identification helps make your storage experience quick and convenient. On top of it all we offer wide aisles for vehicle access.

Moving Supplies for You

We help with moving and packing headaches by providing moving supplies right in our office. From dollies and carts to boxes and tape, at iStorage in Bloomfield New Jersey we are happy to provide you with the small materials that can make a big difference.
